Bash(__NEW_LINE_1f2f074755779ed3__ python3 -c "
import json
import urllib.request
import urllib.error
import base64
import ssl

# Read content
with open\(''draft/TH-12_タイ日系企業の福利厚生比較.html'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# Prepare payload
payload = {
    ''title'': ''タイ日系企業の福利厚生比較【2025年最新】駐在員vs現地採用の待遇格差を徹底解説'',
    ''content'': content,
    ''status'': ''publish'',
    ''slug'': ''thailand-japanese-company-benefits-comparison-2025'',
    ''categories'': [77]
}

# Auth
credentials = base64.b64encode\(''careerlinkasia:N2Zz bzSn AWve Pa83 Ap2S 6Mlw''.encode\(\)\).decode\(\)

# Request
url = ''https://kyujin.careerlink.asia/blog/wp-json/wp/v2/posts''
data = json.dumps\(payload\).encode\(''utf-8''\)
req = urllib.request.Request\(url, data=data, method=''POST''\)
req.add_header\(''Content-Type'', ''application/json''\)
req.add_header\(''Authorization'', f''Basic {credentials}''\)

ctx = ssl.create_default_context\(\)
try:
    with urllib.request.urlopen\(req, context=ctx, timeout=60\) as response:
        result = json.loads\(response.read\(\).decode\(\)\)
        print\(f""SUCCESS: ID={result[''id'']}""\)
        print\(f""URL: {result[''link'']}""\)
except urllib.error.HTTPError as e:
    print\(f''HTTP Error {e.code}: {e.read\(\).decode\(\)[:300]}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error: {e}''\)
")
